title: Get off your fat ass
dialogue: It's time to get the fuck up.

title: Rise and shine
dialogue: A constant flow of notifications has woken you up. Find your phone to see what's going on.

title: Gotta go, and fast!
dialogue: Go to the door to leave your house

title: Fisrt!!1
dialogue: You and your friends decided to meet at the pub. Stop by your friend Ian's house first!

title: One more can't hurt, right?
dialogue: You've met up with Ian, now go to the pub

title: Let's get fucked up!
dialogue: You and your friends have met at the pub! Time to get wasted!
